member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetDepthMode
member.summary: Sets the depth mode property associated with this visual.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetOffsetZ
member.summary: Changes the value of OffsetZ property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetOffsetZ
member.summary: Animates the value of the OffsetZ property.
member.param: The animation to control the OffsetZ property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetOpacity
member.summary: Sets the value of the visual's opacity property.
member.param: The new value for the opacity property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetOpacity
member.summary: Animates the value of the visual's opacity property.
member.param: The animation that will be used to control the value of the opacity property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetTransform
member.summary: Sets the Transform property of this visual to the specified 4-by-4 transform matrix.
member.param: The 4-by-4 transform matrix that is used to modify the coordinate system of this visual.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetTransform
member.summary: Sets the Transform property of this visual to the specified 3D transform object.
member.param: The transform object that is used to modify the coordinate system of this visual. This parameter can point to an interface or one of its derived interfaces. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3.SetVisible
member.summary: Changes the value of the visual's Visible property.
member.param: The new value for the visible property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionVisual3
member.summary: Represents one DirectComposition visual in a visual tree.
